title: Business Practical Competency Enhancement: Digital Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Program Using Smartphones

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can convert real-life problems into mathematical equations and solve them using the built-in calculator app on smartphones
Learners can visually analyze linear/nonlinear relationships using graphing tools provided in digital worksheets within an LMS
Learners can complete mathematical modeling tasks and provide peer feedback through mobile collaboration tools with fellow learners

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
